research.title: He rangahau mō Scratch
research.conductors: Kei te rangahaua Scratch e te MIT Scratch Team me ngā kairangahau o ngā whare wānanga kē atu, pērā ki Yasmin Kafai o te University of Pennsylvania Graduate School of Education, Karen Brennan o te Harvard Graduate School of Education, Benjamin Mako Hill kei te University of Washington, Andrés Monroy Hernandez kei Microsoft Research, Mimi Ito me Crystle Martin kei te University of California, Irvine, Quinn Burke kei College of Charleston, Deborah Fields kei Utah State University, me Kylie Peppler kei Indiana University.
research.privacy: Mā tō tuari i ngā kaupapa me te uru ki te hāpori tuihono Scratch, kei te āwhina koe i a mātou ki te kimi mārama, ka pēhea te tangata e whakamahi, pēhea e ako mā Scratch. Ina tuaritia ngā kaupapa, ngā tukunga kōrero, ngā rauemi kē rānei i te paetukutuku Scratch, tērā pea ka rangahaua aua mahi, ka tukua hoki ki ngā whakaaturanga, ki ngā pepa me ngā rīpoata. Engari, kāore e tuaritia ngā mōhiohio whaiaro o te tangata. (Mēnā he pātai tāhau, whakapā mai ki konei: {contactLink}.)
research.intro: Kei raro nei ētahi o ngā pepa rangahau, whakaaturanga, me ngā tuhinga roa mō Scratch me te hāpori tuihono Scratch, kua tāpiritia hoki te rārangi o ngā tukunga pūtea nā te National Science Foundation hei tautoko i te Scratch.
research.papers: He Pepa Rangahau me ngā Whakaaturanga
research.grants: He Tukunga Pūtea Na Te National Science Foundation
